subject: Horses
Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
Barbaro (Race Horse)
Belmont Stakes
Preakness Stakes
lead_paragraph: Only 11 horses have won the Derby, Preakness and Belmont to become Triple Crown winners since they began trying in 1919, none since Affirmed in 1978.
snippet: Only 11 horses have won the Derby, Preakness and Belmont to become Triple Crown winners since they began trying in 1919, none since Affirmed in 1978.
